subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: A match featuring two of the most powerful players — Maria Sharapova and Petra Kvitova — is sure to result in both players dictating play during the Wimbledon final on Saturday.
snippet: A match featuring two of the most powerful players — Maria Sharapova and Petra Kvitova — is sure to result in both players dictating play during the Wimbledon final on Saturday.
